---
layout: project
tags: projects
title: "Cowboy Dot PNG"
image: cowboy.png
summary: Cowboy Dot PNG is a fast-paced FPS action game where you use wacky digital art weapons to survive after being reincarnated as a cowboy.
role: Programmer & Game Designer
link:
link-text:
timeframe: June 2025 - July 2025
order: 1
featured: false
---
<div class = "textspace mt-8">
<p class = "">Cowboy Dot PNG is a fast-pased FPS game that brings photoshop-inspired weaponry to the world of retro FPS. You play as Ned Milton, an artist-turned office worker who is reincarnated into his abandoned wild-west art project and forced to fight his own creations.</p>

<p class = "">This game was made by myself and <a href="https://sequoiainthebox.wixsite.com/jaychenportfolio" class="highlight underline">Jay Chen</a> over the course of a semester as part of USC's intermediate game project course. I co-designed the game as well as doing all the programming.</p>
</div>

<div class="relative w-full h-0 pb-[56.25%]">
<iframe class="absolute top-0 left-0 w-full h-full" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rXY8XvHnCa0?si=4BoI1a1G1NSJ8iYy" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
</div>

<div class = "textspace-no-margin my-8">
<p>As a <span class = "highlight">Project Co-Lead</span> I was responsible for:</p>
<ul class = "list-disc ml-4">
    <li>Helping to plan sprints, ensuring deliverables completed on time and that our production was in-scope.</li>
    <li>Communicating with audio designers to create and implement our games <a href="https://johannahjohhchung.bandcamp.com/album/cowboy-dot-png-original-game-soundtrack-vol-1" class="highlight underline">origional soundtrack</a>.</li>
    <li>Creating and delivering bi-weekly standup presentations to communicate project progress and next steps.</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class = "textspace-no-margin my-8">
<p>As a <span class = "highlight">Programmer</span> I was responsible for:</p>
<ul class = "list-disc ml-4">
    <li>Programming all game elements, including the game's unique visual effects some of which have never been done before according to my research.</li>
    <li>Sequencing of all game levels, cutscenes, and dialogue sequences.</li>
    <li>Creation of level-design tools to allow my non-programmer partner to design and iterate on the game maps easily.</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class = "textspace-no-margin my-8">
<p>As a <span class = "highlight">Game Designer</span> I was responsible for:</p>
<ul class = "list-disc ml-4">
    <li>Design of all 3 weapons, and adjusting them using playtest metrics until players enjoyed them all equally.</li>
    <li>Design of all enemy ai behaviors using a visual-scripting graph on a custom system I built.</li>
    <li>Design of a tutorial that introduces our non-standard controls in a way that feels intuitive to experienced FPS players and newcomers alike.</li>
</ul>
</div>
